SELECT O.ORDERS_NUM, O.ORDERS_PRONUM, G.GOODS_TITLE, O.ORDERS_STATUS, O.ORDERS_PRICE, O.ORDERS_DCOST, O.ORDERS_TCOST, O.ORDERS_DATE, TO_CHAR(O.ORDERS_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') AS ORDERS_TIME, O.ORDERS_DNUM
FROM ORDERS O, GOODS G WHERE O.ORDERS_USER = (SELECT MEM_NUM FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}) AND O.ORDERS_PRONUM = G.GOODS_NUM ORDER BY O.ORDERS_DATE DESC

SELECT G.GOODS_NUM, G.GOODS_TITLE, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_DATE, TO_CHAR(G.GOODS_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') AS GOODS_TIME, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, G.GOODS_STATUS FROM GOODS G, ( SELECT MEM_NUM, MEM_ID FROM MEMBER ) M, ORDERS O WHERE G.GOODS_SELLER = M.MEM_NUM AND G.GOODS_DEL_GB = 'N' AND G.GOODS_NUM = O.ORDERS_PRONUM(+) AND M.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} ORDER BY G.GOODS_DATE DESC

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY G.GOODS_NUM DESC) RNUM, G.GOODS_NUM, G.GOODS_TITLE, G.GOODS_PRICE, M.MEM_ID, G.GOODS_REGION, G.GOODS_CATEGORY, G.GOODS_COUNT, G.GOODS_DATE, TO_CHAR(G.GOODS_DATE,'hh24:mi:ss') AS GOODS_TIME, G.GOODS_STATUS, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL, G.GOODS_TSTATUS, G.GOODS_HASH, G.GOODS_CONTENT, NVL(GL2.TOTAL_COUNT, 0) AS TOTAL_COUNT2 FROM GOODS G, GOODS_LIKE GL, MEMBER M, ( SELECT GOODS_LIKE_PARENT, COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM GOODS_LIKE GROUP BY GOODS_LIKE_PARENT ) GL2 WHERE GL.GOODS_LIKE_USER = M.MEM_NUM(+) AND M.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} AND G.GOODS_NUM = GL2.GOODS_LIKE_PARENT(+) AND G.GOODS_DEL_GB = 'N' AND GL.GOODS_LIKE_PARENT = G.GOODS_NUM
SELECT G.GOODS_NUM, G.GOODS_TITLE, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL FROM GOODS WHERE GOODS_NUM IN #{RECENT_SAW_LIST}
